item.title: Hundreds protest in Moorhead for woman killed by ICE agent
item.description: The group gathered for a peaceful protest on the busy Eighth Street to honor the life of a woman shot and killed by a U.S. immigration agent earlier in the week in Minneapolis.

item.title: 'We had whistles. They had guns,' says wife of Minnesota woman killed by ICE agent
item.description: The wife of Renee Good, the woman shot and killed in her car by a federal immigration agent in Minneapolis, says the couple had stopped to support their neighbors on the day of the shooting and described the mother of three as leaving a legacy of kindness.

item.title: Minneapolis Reacts to ICE’s Killing of Renee Nicole Good
item.description: Tensions are high in the city after an ICE officer fatally shot Good while she was in her car. Kristi Noem and Trump have said the shooting was justified, sparking outrage from mayor Jacob Frey and Governor Tim Walz.

Brooklyn Methodist where police say they shot a former NYPD officer

item.title: Inquest report exonerates Mountie in fatal shooting of machete-wielding attacker
item.description: An inquest report into the fatal police shooting of a man — who moments earlier had used a machete to attack someone in a vehicle — praises the actions of the officer and makes no recommendations on how the incident could have been handled differently.
